Html:
I have a marker which follows a certain route of GPS-points. The markers rotates depending on the route (like a gps). 

The problem is that the picture of the marker goes "off route" most of the time. This wasn't the matter when the marker was stable( didn't rotate).

http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/7245/prtscrrotatedmarker.png -> in the picture, the yellow arrow is supposed to be on top of the red "stop"-sign.

Any one got a clue how to solve this?

Thanks in advance

Gilles
check CircleVisual.cs in Demo.WindowsPresentation, i guess you are not setting rotation center correctly
